mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.shixi_id as shixiId ,a.shixi_zhoubao_uuid_number as shixiZhoubaoUuidNumber ,a.shixi_zhoubao_name as shixiZhoubaoName ,a.shixi_zhoubao_types as shixiZhoubaoTypes ,a.shixi_zhoubao_content as shixiZhoubaoContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,shixi.xuesheng_id as shixiXueshengId ,shixi.shixi_uuid_number as shixiUuidNumber ,shixi.shixi_name as shixiName ,shixi.shixi_address as shixiAddress ,shixi.shixi_types as shixiTypes ,shixi.shixi_gangwei as shixiGangwei ,shixi.kaishi_time as kaishiTime ,shixi.jieshu_time as jieshuTime ,shixi.shixi_content as shixiContent ,shixi.shixi_yesno_types as shixiYesnoTypes ,shixi.shixi_yesno_text as shixiYesnoText ,shixi.unpdate_time as unpdateTime ,xuesheng.xuesheng_uuid_number as xueshengUuidNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.yuanxi_types as yuanxiTypes ,xuesheng.banji_types as banjiTypes ,xuesheng.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail
FROM shixi_zhoubao a left JOIN shixi shixi ON a.shixi_id = shixi.id left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} or shixi.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and ( a.shixi_id = #{params.shixiId} )
and a.shixi_zhoubao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiZhoubaoUuidNumber},'%')
and a.shixi_zhoubao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiZhoubaoName},'%')
and a.shixi_zhoubao_types = #{params.shixiZhoubaoTypes}
and a.shixi_zhoubao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiZhoubaoContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.shixi_id IS NOT NULL
and shixi.shixi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiUuidNumber},'%')
and shixi.shixi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiName},'%')
and shixi.shixi_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiAddress},'%')
and shixi.shixi_types = #{params.shixiTypes}
and shixi.shixi_gangwei like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiGangwei},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeEnd})
and shixi.shixi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiContent},'%')
and shixi.shixi_yesno_types = #{params.shixiYesnoTypes}
and shixi.shixi_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.unpdate_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.unpdateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.unpdate_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.unpdateTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixi.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengUuidNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.yuanxi_types = #{params.yuanxiTypes}
and xuesheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
